parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions "Adrian Moleavin, candidat al partidului REPER".  This clearly identifies a parliamentary candidate.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True.  The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The targeting parameters further confirm this, aiming at women aged 30-63 in Dâmbovița County.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The phrase "Votați REPER pe 1 decembrie" ("Vote REPER on December 1st") is a direct call to action, explicitly aiming to influence voters to support a specific party in the parliamentary elections. The content of the post, linking tourism development to job creation, is presented as a reason to vote for REPER, further strengthening the electoral objective.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post touches upon a relevant societal issue (tourism and job creation), it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic content.  It directly promotes a specific political party and candidate, making it promotional rather than informative in a journalistic sense.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post does not express a personal opinion; instead, it presents a political message intended to sway voters.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>584385034149116</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, identified by ad_archive_id 584385034149116, fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It directly refers to a specific candidate (Adrian Moleavin) and party (REPER) participating in the parliamentary elections. The paid advertisement format ensures it addresses the wide public.  The explicit call to vote for REPER on December 1st clearly demonstrates an electoral objective. The content, while touching upon a relevant topic, is presented solely to promote the candidate and party, lacking the objectivity of journalistic reporting.  The post's targeting parameters further indicate an intention to influence voters.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Adrian Moleavin</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>REPER</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
REPER Dâmbovița, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024 (ID postare: 584385034149116), care promovează direct candidatul Adrian Moleavin și Partidul REPER la alegerile parlamentare din 1 decembrie, cu fraza explicită „Votați REPER pe 1 decembrie”, având un efect electoral clar pozitiv pentru REPER.  Reclama, deși abordează dezvoltarea turismului, o face într-un mod evident propagandistic, lipsit de obiectivitate jurnalistică, și este direcționată către un public țintă specific (femei cu vârste între 30 și 63 de ani din județul Dâmbovița), conform datelor din Ad Library.  Cheltuielile pentru reclamă sunt sub 100 RON, conform Ad Library, iar postarea a atins o estimare de 50.000-100.000 de persoane.  Informațiile de contact ale advertiserului sunt disponibile în Ad Library: steluta.munteanu@partidulreper.ro și +40720412010.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
